text: Millimeter wave reception TRUST experiment In the coherent mode all local oscillator signals are derived from a single oscillator phase-locked to the C-band signal carrier transmitted from the ground to the spacecraft. In the noncoherent mode, the local oscillator frequencies are generated within the spacecraft by a highly stable fixed-frequency oscillator with an initial frequency tolerance of ±10 PPM and a long term stability of better than ±3 PPM in three months. 13-66 Table 13-32.
